Greetings CIS Community,

It is with great honor to announce Joseph Canty has accepted the position as Head of School, reporting directly to the Board of Directors. Joseph joins us beginning on July 13. He will be a great asset to Carolina International School. He brings personal values around education, diversity, and service that matches the mission and vision of our school charter.

Joseph brings over 15 years of education and non-profit experiences. Immediately prior to joining CIS, Joseph was Director of Diversity, Equity & Inclusion for an independent 3-12 school in Maryland. He has a proven history of progressive responsibility, team development, and a great understanding of charter schools.

Please see the attached bio to get to know more about Joseph.

Best regards,

Kasi Eagle, Board Chair
Carolina International School

...a Duke Energy helicopter!!!!
Dear CIS, despite rumors of unidentified flying objects in the front part of our campus these days, the reality is quite otherwise. Duke Energy is replacing 18.8 miles of overhead fiber-optic ground wire (OPGW), a small portion of which runs through our property on their right of way. So, though entertaining and interesting to watch them in action up there, that's all it is, not a bird nor a plane, nor even a UFO, just a yellow-colored Duke Energy helicopter!

David Kukielski
Head of School
